name: Falani North [1:Point]
Falani Pinios [2:Point]
Falani East [3:Point]
Falani South [4:Point]
Falani Center [5:Point]
Larissa DEYAL [6:Point]
Larissa KTEL [7:Point]
Larissa Archaio_Theatro [8:Point]
Dasochori [9:Point]
Omorfochori [10:Point]
Sensor payload data explained
info:
# VALUES (measurements from sensor):
flood_depth: water level (depth) in millimeters. 
Values will be from 0mm (min) to 3000mm (max) 
which is the installation height of the water depth sensor
humidity: ranges from 0 - 100 (%)
temperature:ranges from -10C - 45C

# TAGS (static values from sensor)
name: unique identifier that describes the installed location (in text)
lon: sensor's installation location longitude value
lat: sensor's installation location latitude value

# THRESHOLD
threshold value for AllERT activation is set to 250 mm

name: Show Sensors & Add AllERT ESRI Layers
Sensor Values that will be sent to MQTT Broker
Check AllERT Status

func:
var icon = msg.water_sensor_icon;
var layer_name = "AllERT Sensors (NodeRED)";

msg.payload=
[
    {
        "OBJECTID": 1,
        "name": "Falani North [1:Point]",
        "lon": 22.40991275,
        "lat": 39.73259648,
        "icon": icon,
        "layer": layer_name
    },
    {

    },
    {
        "OBJECTID": 5,

        "lon": 22.39711284,
        "lat": 39.7220062,
        "icon": icon,
        "layer": layer_name
    },
    {

]
